page.title: 15HEAD TRAINER ON EPSOM DOWNS
page.content: {Mr. Philip Mitchell}has lived at Downs House for 35 years.The first person to own Downs House was{Colonel {Kelly}who had the first Derby winner called{Young Eclipse.}Mr. Mitchell has 45 horses and 19 people work for him. He has met{Sean Connery, Princess {Anne, the Queen and the Queen Mother. Mr. Mitchell and his family have a big party for their owners on Derby Day. The best horse Mr. Mitchell trained was{Attivo,}which won the{Chester Cup, and{Pittman's Derby in 1974.}The most famous race he has won was the{Lincoln {Handicap in 1982}with a horse called {King's Glory.}The most exciting thing that has happened to him was when he had his first Royal Ascot winner {Sylvan Barbarosa}which won the first race on Gold Cup Day at 66 to 1.
